Question: Mohamed Al-Fayed bought a multi-million-pound yacht, the Jonikal, a 60-metre yacht on which to entertain this person and her sons.
Hints: In 1968, this person was sent to Riddlesworth Hall, an all-girls boarding school.
One biographer suggested this person suffered from borderline personality disorder.
This person's funeral took place in Westminster Abbey on 6 September 1997.
